General-purpose tools

  • selkie.manifest — Manifest of sizes, hashes

      • Create foo.sizes
      • Create and check foo.md5
      • Create foo.hashes
      • Creating foo.chksum
      • Writing to stdout
      • Extracting sizes from foo.hashes or foo.chksum
      • Selecting directories
      • Synchronizing directories
